**Tender Description**
----------------------

The Transport Canada (TC) requires a Managed Services Provider (MSP) to store its paper-based records inventory and provide records management services. The MPS must ensure that the TC paper records inventory is identified, accessioned, physically stored, and made available to the department upon request.

TC has a requirement to send its closed physical records to offsite warehouses for storage until their retention periods are met and the records can be disposed. The retention periods for TC files range from 2 to 100 years, although most TC files have a retention period of 10 years once they are in offsite storage.

**Location**
------------

Offsite physical records storage and management services are required for TC offices in Ontario, the National Capital Region, Manitoba, Alberta, and British Columbia.

**Contract Information**
------------------------

One contract will be awarded as a result of this Request for Proposal, with the option to extend by five (5) additional one (1) year option periods.
